data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Bushehr.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bushehr, Iran
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: There are 1,163,400 people living in the state of Bushehr. Only about 6,061 might be believers.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Bushehr, Iran.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,163,400 people living in Bushehr.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,163,400 people living in the state of Bushehr.
Spirit, I pray that the Astiani people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Bushehr, Iran.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Bushehr, Iran, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bushehr, Iran has a population of 1,163,400.

We estimate Bushehr has 6,061 people who might know Jesus, 15,710 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,141,629 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Bushehr, Iran to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
